name: Another Dodging Game
description:
As the title says, Another Dodging Game is a minimalist game with simple mechanics, whose main challenge is to dodge all the moving platforms.

Don't know how to play? Continue reading this!

  • Use the arrow keys or WASD to move around the box.
  • If the platforms crush you or you go out of the box, it's game over!
  • All the platforms cast a shadow to warn you where they are gonna fall, so be careful.

And don't forget to try beating your best highscore! (   mine is 31 :)   )

Newbies Game Jam:

Another Dodging Game is a game developed for the Newbies Game Jam organized by kosmotion. The Game Jam's theme was minimalism. This was implemented using limited graphics desings making it minimalistic and simple, with non-complex mechanics.

Developed by anotherBoredDev

Thanks to VOiD Gaming for the HyperCasual Music Pack from Unity Assets Store
